participant_1.background:
I get to wear my favorite color, purple, every day.
I love the suburbs because I can read my books about trains without being disturbed by the noise of the city.
i am unsociable.
I have a rose garden in my backyard that I love to spend time in.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.

participant_2.background:
I feed my dog before I do anything else.
sometimes , i sit by strangers on the subway and strike up a conversation.
i work as a meeting coordinator.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
my mother is a teacher.

content.text: I love the suburbs, the quiet and the peace.
I love the suburbs too! I have a dog named Max, he's a golden retriever. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a beautiful rose garden in my backyard, I love spending time in it.
I love roses! They're so beautiful. I'm not very close with my family, but I love my mom. She's a teacher.
I'm not very close with my family either. I don't like being disturbed when I'm reading my books about trains.
I love reading! I read a lot of non-fiction books, mostly about history. I love to learn new things.
I love learning new things too, but I also love to read fiction. I love the way books can take me to different worlds.
I love that too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I'm so glad we met, we have so much in common!
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon!
Me too! Let's exchange numbers so we can stay in touch.
